trustfund:
TF040703-LATIN AMERICA:FINANCIAL
            MANAGEMENT OF PUBLIC SECTOR MODERNIZATION,TF039372-ARGENTINA - PUBLIC INVESTMENT
            STRENGTHENING TAL (3958-AR),TF029188-PHRD-PUBLIC INVESTMENT STRENGTHENING

abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Investment Strengthening
            Technical Assistance Project aims to enhance the
            effectiveness and efficiency of the government's public
            expenditure management by improving its investment process,
            strengthening its project analysis capabilities and building
            up the project and program evaluation capacity in Argentina.
            These goals will be achieved by: 1) building the
            ownership/commitment of senior government officials to the
            application of good practice in the formulation and
            implementation of strategic investment decision-making; 2)
            building a sustainable decentralized capacity to identify,
            prepare, select and evaluate investment by central
            government agencies; 3) carrying out basic studies in
            support of basic investment strategies in priority sectors;
            and 4) supporting Direccion Nacional de Inversion Publica y
            Financiamiento de Proyectos (DNIP) in the implementation of
            the National Investment Plan System (SNIP). The project
            consists of the following 5 components: 1) sectoral
            investment decision making; 2) improvement of agencies'
            project analysis and evaluation capacity; 3) basic studies
            in support of sectoral investment strategies; 4) support to
            the preparation of the National Public Investment Plan
            (NPIP); and 5) project administration.
